page.title: 14WOMEN'S INSTITUTE CLAXBY
page.content: Although our Institute is small we are a very active and friendly group. We meet once a month, except August. Each month we have a different speaker on topics of interest, coffee, stalls and raffles. Apart from regular meetings we have various outings both educational and pleasure, which include canvas, painting, sewing and flower arranging classes; gliding, walking the countryside, also we attend various festivals and exhibitions. Always there are new opportunities for members to try. We are one of the few institutes which own our own hall, therefore. we have to maintain it. Money is usually raised by coffee mornings and various other events. We go carol singing at Christmas and donate proceeds to a local charity.
